front.title: Certification of standard reference material 3389 ginsenoside calibration solution
front.abstract: Standard Reference Material (SRM) 3389 is intended as a calibration solution for use for the determination of ginsenosides in natural matrix samples. A unit of SRM 3389 consists of two different ampule solutions: (1) four ampules of a six-component mixture of ginsenoside Rb1, Rb2, Rc, Rd, Re, and Rg1 and (2) one ampule of a single component ginsenoside Rf. This publication documents the production, analytical methods, and statistical evaluations involved in production of this SRM.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
